questions.text: a) Nutritionist appearance is clean, neat and tidy.
b) Wears formal office wear with closed toe shoes.
c) Wears clean and ironed white coat and Health Service badge.

pages.title: 2. Pharmacy or Nutrition Counter or Signage and Display

questions.text: a) Valid pharmacist Poison License A and Annual Retention Certificate for the premise displayed.
b) Pharmacist On-Duty Name and Time Signage displayed.
c) Pharmacist Signage displayed accurately and as appropriately:
options: i. Dispensing of Group Poison B, Calendar Schedule, Off- Duty, Pharmacist Out For Break.
ii. Health Consultation Poster, Health Consultation Promotion Poster.

questions.text: d) Poison Record Books Displayed Neatly.
e) Poison Dispensing Envelopes and Stickers Displayed Neatly.
f) Meditag decoder displayed.
g) No display of unapproved supplier countertop or leaflets or brochures.
